description: HTTP1Settings provides HTTP/1 configuration on the listener.

enableTrailers.description: EnableTrailers defines if HTTP/1 trailers should be proxied by Envoy.

http10.description: HTTP10 turns on support for HTTP/1.0 and HTTP/0.9 requests.

preserveHeaderCase.description: PreserveHeaderCase defines if Envoy should preserve the letter case of headers. By default, Envoy will lowercase all the headers.
